title: About Grupo Pongaiense de Combate ao Câncer
subtitle: An organization dedicated to supporting people and families in their journey against cancer, offering care, information and a united community.
missionText1: The Grupo Pongaiense de Combate ao Câncer has as its main mission to offer integral support to cancer patients and their families, promoting quality of life and well-being throughout the treatment process.
missionText2: We believe that no one should face cancer alone, and therefore we work tirelessly to create a solid and welcoming support network in our community.
careWithLoveText: Each person is unique and deserves special attention on their journey
solidarityText: We believe in the power of unity and mutual support to overcome challenges.
transparencyText: We maintain honesty and clarity in all our actions and communications.
hopeText: We cultivate hope as a driving force for overcoming and healing.
joinOurStoryText: Whether as a patient, family member, volunteer or supporter, your presence makes a difference in many people's lives. Join us on this journey of care and hope.
contactUsText: We are always available to help and clarify doubts.
